home_h2: Share information with just a tap
home_section_2_description: Using NFC technology, the I-B card can share all of your information when tapped against a smartphone.
home_section_3_text: Join the 100+ companies using I-B CARD.
iphone_step_description: TAP na PREDNJI GORNJI dio telefona
products_p_limited: Here goes the english version of the card description.
products_p_standard: Here goes the english version of the card description.
products_p_custom: We create a custom made design for your card.
product_explain: If you are interesed in this or any other product, fill in the form and we will contact you with the offer as soon as possible.
section_5_h1: Activate your account in four simple steps!
section_5_p_1: After placing your order, you will receive instructions on how to provide us with your logo or design for on the card.
section_5_p_2: Here you can add, edit & enable what you would like to share with your contactless card
section_5_p_3: It's that simple! Share who you are and what you do with with one quick tap.
section_6_h1: See how our customer are using the i-b cards
section_6_p_1: Podelite lako vase kontakt detalje, adrese, website linkove i mejlove.
section_6_p_2: Podelite sve vezano za vas i ono sto radite.
section_6_p_4: Povezite sa vasim aplikacijama, video sadrzajem, e-menu i drugo.
hint_h1: Have an idea how we can improve our services?
hint_p: Send to us an idea and if we implement it, you will recieve card for free!
products_p_1: Our most exclusive product - premium, innovative, bespoke.
products_p_2: Eco Friendly. With every card sold we plant a tree around the world.
products_p_3: Our most budget friendly card for contactless networking.
black_metal_description: Exclusive black i-b card. Highest quality black metal. Comes in a handmade luxury brushed leather box and in a personalized black case.
rose_metal_description: Premium Rose gold i-b card. Highest quality rose gold metal. The perfect blend of handmade leather box and metal.
gold_metal_description: Our most exclusive Golden i-b card. Premium quality gold metal. A gentle touch of the handmade leather box will win you over.
black_pvc_description: A black matte i-b card with a special effect. Powerfull look. The handmade leather case fits perfectly with your card.
black_bamboo_description: Our most exclusive product made out of wood. Black bamboo i-b card comes in black luxury box.
rose_glitter_description: Only 100 rose gold glitter in limited edition. Rose gold glitter comes in black luxury box.
product_powerful_black_description: Our most exclusive product.Highest quality black metal. Comes in a handmade luxury brushed leather box and in a personalized black case.
product_golden_shine_description: Our most exclusive product.Highest quality black metal. Comes in a handmade luxury brushed leather box and in a personalized black case.
product_rose_gold_description: Our most exclusive product. Highest quality rose gold metal. Comes in a handmade luxury brushed leather box and in a personalized black case.
product_black_texture_description: The card is made of black bamboo and is an inspiration for anyone who wants to show their artistic soul. Comes in a handmade luxury box and in a personalized black case.
product_black_matte_description: A black matte card with a special effect. Powerfull look. Comes in a handmade luxury box and in a  personalized black case.
product_glitter_yellow_description: Do you want to be part of the chosen society and be the owner of a 100 limited edition card? The card comes in special black box and personalized black case.
product_glitter_pink_description: Have you ever dreamed that contact is so easy to share? Choose your i-b card and be the owner of a 100 limited edition card. The card comes in special black box and personalized black case.
product_pure_white_description: Standard white PVC i-b card. Perfect for everday use. The card comes in a personalized case.
product_bamboo_description: Standard wooden i-b card. Show your artistic soul. The card comes in a personalized case.
product_cherry_description: The card comes in a personalized case.
